br.com.mpro3.MproEntity

Class DBManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.mpro3.MproEntity.DBManager

  • public class DBManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Exposes methods to execute sql commands in SQLite database.

    DBManager has methods to execute sql commands:

    • execute(String) to execute sql commands with no retrieve data;
    • query(String) to execute sql commands with retrieve data;

    Use br.com.mpro3.MproEntity.customSQLiteOpenHelper for create a SQLite database file.
